hero.subtitle: Complete booking system, payments, and client management. No code required.

timeline.step1Desc: Design your branded app in 60 seconds. No coding required.
timeline.step2Desc: Your studio goes live instantly inside the Dal AI network.
timeline.step3Desc: Clients download Dal AI, but they see only your brand. It is your own real app.

step1.title: Build your app with words.

step1.placeholder: e.g. A high-energy boxing gym in New York with a focus on community challenges.

step9.title: Ready to launch?
step9.updateDesc: You can edit your content, colors, and schedule even after going live. No app store updates required.
